author: nspiegelberg
msg: HBase RegionSplitter: Split on low-loaded regions first
Always split on low-loaded regions first.  This will prevent
the load balancing slop from kicking in during rolling splits.

author: nspiegelberg
msg: When deploying HBase over Avatarnode HDFS the following diff :
D293997 breaks initialization of a region, since it throws an exception
for listStatus() if the parent directory does not exist instead of just
returning null. This results in the region never being opened.
Test Plan: Test on dev cluster.

author: nspiegelberg
msg: RegionSplitter : Allow NSFRE during logical split verification

author: nspiegelberg
msg: Update pom.xml for hbase to include version 2.9 of the Surefire plugin
Some of the hbase tests were failing with the following error:
[INFO] Error while executing forked tests.; nested exception is
The above error was fixed in Surefire 2.7
In addition, the surefire plugin wasn't quitting when the tests were finished.
Test Plan: Run tests and see if they are more reliable

author: nspiegelberg
msg: Don't schedule major compactions during peak time.
Major compactions triggering at peak time cause a lot of trouble as
they load up the cluster quite a bit with a lot of IO. We should have logic in
place which prevents major compactions from triggering at peak time. This is an
Test Plan: 1) Unit test the peak time logic.
